<center>![AlphaVPS](https://alphavps.com/assets/img/logo-purple-dark.svg "")</center>

**About us:**
[AlphaVPS](https://alphavps.com) is a leading IaaS provider in Europe, offering [cheap VPS](https://alphavps.com/cheap-vps.html "cheap VPS"), [KVM VPS](https://alphavps.com/kvm-vps.html "KVM VPS"), [Dedicated Servers](https://alphavps.com/dedicated-servers.html "Dedicated Servers"), [Colocation](https://alphavps.com/colocation.html "Colocation"), Connectivity, and custom solutions out of 5 worldwide locations. Operating since 2013 and based out of Europe. Our offices are located in Sofia, Bulgaria. We are staffed around the clock and our team is fully in-house with zero outsourcing. We run our network under AS203380, own our hardware and our Sofia office is located inside the Telepoint DataCenter in our flagship Sofia location, just above our equipment. Our company name is DA International Group Ltd. and we are an EU VAT-registered company.  


**Our Network:**
**Sofia, Bulgaria** - 79.124.7.8 - http://lgbg.alphavps.bg/
**Nuremberg, Germany** - 185.168.8.3 - http://lgde.alphavps.bg/
**London, United Kingdom** - 130.185.251.6 - http://lguk.alphavps.bg/
**New York, USA** - 172.93.102.114 - http://lgny.alphavps.bg/
**Los Angeles, USA** - 107.174.48.67 - http://lgla.alphavps.bg/

You can learn more about our network over [here](https://alphavps.com/network.html "here")!


To celebrate the launch of our [new website](https://alphavps.com "new website"), I've prepared a special offer, with very limited quantities for the LE community!

**2GB-OVZ**
RAM: 2048MB
CPU: 2 shared CPU cores
SSD: 15GB
Bandwidth: 1TB on 1Gbit/s port
1x IPv4 IP
BG , DE , UK , LA, NY
<strong>€19.99/y</strong>
[ORDER NOW](https://alphavps.com/clients/cart.php?a=add&pid=292 "ORDER NOW")

**About our current offerings:**  
- All prices are VAT Excl.  
- Regular TOS and AUP applies  
- All limited special plans are unmanaged.  
- At the time of posting, the USD to EUR exchange rate is: 1.18USD per 1EUR  
- Dedicated server deployment is between an hour and 5 business days  
- All orders are subject to manual review
